item.description:
This one is a fundraiser held at the historic Life Saving Station in Nahant - see the restored interior of this landmark building and participate in a wine tasting while munching on cheese and crackers by the sea. The bar will be open from 4-6pm. Space is limited, so come early!

Menfolk are also invited to this public event! Some folks may want to grab dinner afterwards  before heading home. Recommended: The Blue Ox in Lynn for a special meal or one of the many restaurants in Vinnin Square Swampcott like Panera, Uno's, or Bertucci's.

Just $10. Wines will also be on sale and a portion of those proceeds will be donated to the continued restoration and adaptive re-use of historic buildings and open space in Nahant.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Wine Tasting at the Nahant Life Saving Station March 31
